## Plane.flip() method

Create a new plane object by flipping another plane's normal.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static flip(plane: Plane, result?: Plane): Plane;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

plane


</td><td>

[Plane](doc/markdown/./base.plane.md)


</td><td>

The plane to which the normal will be flipped.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

result


</td><td>

[Plane](doc/markdown/./base.plane.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ A plane object to which the result will be written, if not specified, a new plane object will be returned.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Plane](doc/markdown/./base.plane.md)

The result plane.
